location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 71 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter forwarding packets and despatches from Lieutenant Colonel John Macdonald addressed to the Government at Bombay, Supreme government and Madras Government which contain intelligence relating to the state of affairs in Persia.The letter also refers to a report from the Government agent at Shiraz (no longer enclosed) that Colonel Macdonald had arrived at Tehran.
